titleStmt.title: The Parliament's answer, to his Majesties gracious letter of the fourth of June, 1663.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to his most excellent Majesty ;

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: Edinburgh 28 July, 1663. Glencairn Cancellarius, J.P. D. Par.
